item.title: Brazil's Bolsonaro arrested, adding to tensions with Trump
item.description: Trump has referred to the case as a "witch hunt" and called it grounds for a 50% tariff on Brazilian goods taking effect on Wednesday.

item.title: Jobs data revisions are common. Here's how the process works.
item.description: The commissioner Trump fired over “rigged” jobs report likely didn’t have a hand in assembling the report, former BLS officials say.

item.title: EU will delay planned U.S. tariffs for six months to allow for trade talks
item.description: President Donald Trump last month announced a trade deal with the EU that included 15% tariffs on most European goods to the U.S.

item.title: Trump stokes conspiracies about jobs data, as White House defends firing BLS chief
item.description: The comments are the latest effort by the White House to undercut economic data that does not fit within Trump's political narrative.

item.title: Trump says he will 'substantially' raise tariffs on India over Russian oil purchases
item.description: President Donald Trump said on Monday he will substantially raise tariffs on India over its purchases of Russian oil.
